summary:
Papa - "Papa," was inspired by the legendary Pepe the Frog and his iconic status in internet culture. The team behind Papa aimed to create a token that would not only capture the essence of the Pepe meme but also provide a platform for the community to engage in a variety of fun and exciting activities.

 tokenomics - Token Supply: 420.69B
No Taxes, No Bullshit. It’s that simple.
LP tokens are burnt, and contract ownership is renounced.
CA: 0x134bb4ed7dd3c0dacb41619ca31bee5fc340c590

 roadmap - Phase 1: Meme
Phase 2: Vibe and HODL
Phase 3: Ethereum Meme Takeover

 how to buy - Wallet
Download metamask or your wallet of choice from the app store or google play store. Desktop users, download the google chrome extension by going to metamask.io.
Get Some ETH
You can deposit $ETH or buy into your metamask wallet using any crypto exchange of your choice.
Uniswap
Now swap your ETH to buy $PAPA. We have ZERO taxes so you don’t need to worry about buying with a specific slippage
Get Rich
Lastly Hold onto your $PAPA and see your money grow.
